## Checklist

### General
- [ ] I have read the contributing guidelines
- [ ] My changes follow the existing format and style
- [ ] I have checked for typos and grammatical errors
- [ ] All links are working and point to official sources
- [ ] Information is current and accurate

### For New Platforms
- [ ] I have used the "Add New Platform" template
- [ ] Platform is not already listed
- [ ] Placed in the appropriate category
- [ ] Included all required information
- [ ] Updated comparison matrix if applicable
- [ ] Verified Next.js/frontend support level

### For Updates
- [ ] Changes are based on official sources
- [ ] Pricing information is current
- [ ] Maintained consistent formatting
- [ ] Updated relevant sections (comparison matrix, etc.)
